column4: is it possible to switch the kernel from the default installed on to the p4 optimized one supplied by synaptic without the need to recompile it, and if is there a howto or something on the wiki? i happen to find no info on that
after you know it works fine, you can remove the previous one.  doesn't hurt to keep both for a little bit (beside the disk space it uses)
yes, actually i don't think the kernel uses that much space but once i know it works for sure i like to keep the system clean without any corpses in the long run ;) anyways. thanks for help i'll try
